title: Fizz feels so unsatisfying to play
body: Taking the two versions of Fizz and comparing them, putting a majority of Fizz's burst on a delay feels so unsatisfying. It feels _bad_ to play as that champion. The worst part is, it also feels bad to play AGAINST Fizz, because that damage can still take you by surprise. IMO, this Fizz rework, now that it's had lots and lots of time to be felt and worked with, did nothing to fix the miserable feeling of vsing a Fizz, and just removed the fun of playing him.

replies.body: I came here to say that, but I will just give you my upvote.
